data.title: Ghost Trips Paranormal Investigations Group Tours
meta_keywords: Things to do in Traverse City
What to do in Traverse City
data.meta_description: Multi Day Tour Ghost Tours, Ghost Hunting, Scenic Trip. Stays at haunted bed and breakfasts, Haunted Hotels, and Dining at Haunted Restaurants. Overnight Ghost Trip.
data.text:
NEW FOR THE SEPTEMBER 2025 Season!

​

Pack your bags paranormal enthusiasts for a paranormal adventure through haunted Ireland.

We explore popular paranormal sites, take ghost tours, history tours, enjoy wonderful cuisine, some of our stays are in reported and famous haunted castles and inns.

​

These tours are designed to explore Ireland in so many ways. Do join us on a once in a lifetime paranormal adventure!

NEW FOR THE AUGUST 2025 Season!

​

Pack your bags paranormal enthusiasts for a paranormal adventure that starts in Traverse City Michigan and explores or ghost hunts sites such as Detroit's The Whitney, Ohio's State Reformatory, Kentucky's Waverly Hills Sanitorium, and the Octagon Hall.

We explore popular paranormal sites, take ghost tours, history tours, enjoy wonderful cuisine, some of our stays are in reported and famous haunted hotels.

​

These tours are designed to explore the world in so many ways. Do join us on a once in a lifetime paranormal adventure!

NEW FOR THE MAY 2025 Season!

​

Wicc'd Retreats are designed around the paranormal, metaphysical, and the lore of witchcraft. Experts in the fields of paranormal, metaphysical, and wicca lead a retreat designed to rejuvenate the spirit within while exploring and expanding into the world of wonder and paranormal.

Some of the highlights include private historical/paranormal tours, spa activities, yoga and meditation activities, self-help workshops with metaphysical themes, metaphysical activities like psychic and tarot card readings, and stays at places that invoke one to explore the past and find the treasure of moments of quiet at the stays.
